suggestedTasks.title: Add unit tests for file staging component states
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the diffviewer.svelte staging button component. Tests should cover all possible states: unstaged, staging in progress, staged, and error scenarios. Focus on testing the handleStageToggle function and state transitions.
suggestedTasks.reason: No existing tests for critical UI component interaction

suggestedTasks.title: Improve accessibility for file staging button
suggestedTasks.description: Enhance the stage/unstage button's accessibility by adding proper ARIA attributes, ensuring keyboard navigability, and improving screen reader support. Review current implementation of onclick and disabled states to meet WCAG guidelines.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation may have accessibility limitations
